meanings.sent1: The plusher sofa was so soft and cozy.
meanings.sent2: The hotel room was much plusher than I expected.
meanings.sent3: She felt like a queen sitting on the plusher chair.
meanings.sent4: The plusher carpet felt like walking on clouds.
meanings.sent5: The plusher blankets made the bed feel like a dream.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that makes something more luxurious or comfortable.
meanings.sent1: The interior designer was known as the plusher of homes.
meanings.sent2: The plusher of the party was the talented chef.
meanings.sent3: The plusher of the office was the new air conditioning system.
meanings.sent4: She was the plusher of the group with her elegant style.
meanings.sent5: The plusher of the event was the live music performance.
